name: Benjamin Chung
text: Order pizza online, went to the store by 9:45pm when online it says it closes at 10pm and it was closed!

name: Bruce Howell
text: My kid loves Pizza Hut pizza.  Ordering online is not easy.  Always short on help, they sometimes they don't pick up the phone either.  It's amazing they remain in business at this location.

name: Tyler Breen
text: Would’ve been a perfect 5 stars if my food wasn’t 30 min late. Though in the driver’s defense when I asked, he said there was some sort of problem back at the store that was unavoidable. I can understand that, I just should’ve been notified …More

name: Trenton Gunder
text: Food is always super late. They say 30-40 minutes, but to them 30 minutes is usually an hour and 15 minutes or more. Usually more. They forget things ALL the time and than take even longer to get them to you if you even feel like wasting …More

name: Jeffrey Rosenbaum
text: They said they were bringing back original pan pizza...they lied. Pan pizza used to be good,  now it sucks. Probably should have given 1 star.

name: David Arner
text: Not good. Avoid this location. Food took more than double the time (45 vs 1:30)  and then the pizza was horrible. They skimped on the cheese so it mostly sauce, the pan pizza dough was nearly dry and had no flavor. Pizza hut isn't great, …More

name: Richard Miller
text: This Pizza Hut is for carryout only - no tables, no seating. No problem, cuz they still serve that tasty Pizza Hut pizza. And if ya sign up on line - they always have a good deal to save dough! Clever pun with the dough, huh!?

name: red kiss
text: They always forget to bring sauce even if i paid. they stole 5 sauces total from me. And you should know that their estimate delivery time is always doubles or triples. I ordered pizz at 7:35pm and I didnt still get it.it 's 10:09PM now.

name: Amy CraigMart
text: Zero stars? Filthy store. TERRIBLE delivery  - if it's late-ish (around an hour before close) and they don't feel like making your order? They'll just cancel it and refund your money. No call. No answering the phone. Happened twice. LOSER - order from virtually anyplace else.

name: Shawn Burns
text: Terrible service. Tried to order via phone and couldn’t figure out how to take a CC. …More

name: Stacey Core
text: My chicken be cooked to perfection nice and crispy

name: Chad B
text: Best Pizza Hut around. This isn't even my local Pizza Hut so they came deliver to my house. It's worth the drive.

name: Tammie Staley
text: I agree with previous posters that this location has really gone downhill from the appearance now to the service. I only order from Puzza Hut- staple in our house growing up. So I really enjoy. This location is the closest to me but moving …More

name: Paul Spencer
text: Feels kinda dirty, looks kinda dirty. Took them over an hour to make a single two topping pizza on a slow Monday night. Do not recommend.

name: Carvel Rider
text: These dudes don’t listen. This pizza hut has really going downhill in the last two years  the guys look really dingy and dirty their appearances are bad for people making food One guy had On Street clothes while making orders like he just …More

name: Taylor Bridges
text: Yesterday at 6:13 pm I ordered A large pizza, half sausage-half pepperoni, and 12 mild buffalo wings from the Pizza Hut at 1448 Bethlehem Pike. When i placed the order, the food was said to be delivered by 7:15. I included in the delivery …More

name: Sammie m
text: Called three times about my pizza . Was told each time it was on the way . Finally said forget after 2 hours  and the guy on phone he didn’t even have my order .  Never again

name: roberta bellamy
text: No seating only take out

name: Branden Wansel
text: Fast & friendly service. This is a delivery and takeout-only location. There is no seating. Conveniently located next to a Wine & Spirits store and about 50ft from a Walgreens located in the same parking lot.

name: koron english
text: Great food and service

name: Vin J
text: Very very slow...also it gives off a dirty vibe

name: Jin Lee
text: I wish I could give zero stars if I could. Told me delivery was going to take more than an hour and told me pick-up would be better. I had to call because they were out of all these toppings and didn't want them to charge extra which they …More

name: Heaven Piper
text: You guys suck. Literally ordered here twice, the first time I waited over an hour for a delivery. The order wasn’t done well (wings weren’t tossed, breadsticks burned).., gave it another shot tonight. Had my fiancé drive out of the way …More

name: Janell
text: The food was good but u wait to long for your food

text: Need to improve on a few things UPGRADE... for the better and treat your employees better everyone can be happy team work is key

text:

text: They need more staff even though the guy that was there was doing the job of 4 people

name: J Anthony
text: Just......don't. This place is so dirty it's disgusting and on top of that the service is extremely slow!

name: Jforgotten
text: Delivery is slow, their pizzas are cold and burnt and they never have anyone to deliver. I only order here because for some reason the one closest to my house, doesnt even deliver to me

name: Briheem Brown
text: love there food. havent messed up an order yet. nick, albert, and Russel are always nice. love it there 5stars all the way

name: parker amaker
text: Went there and it took a bit for the associate to come to the front but when he did it was decent service. Food looked good so that's a plus.

name: naadiya muhammad
text: NOONE USES GLOVES OR HAIRNETS. I seen them go in the back pick things out of the fridge and go straight to making pizzas. All the guys have long  Beards and don't use hairnets over them. One guy had a hand filled with gold rings no gloves at all. Just plain disgusting.

name: Gabrielle Striking
text: Same issue took 2 hours to deliver so I just canceled

name: Dub Sh
text: Helpful service but don't like the pizza taste

name: Stephen Meehan
text: They tefused to deliver my food. Wouldn't even take my order. Worst customer service ive ever experienced.

name: Keisha Caldwell
text: The food is always great . However the customer service not so much . I came in to pick up my order . No one was was there to greet me , or ask what I order for a good 10 mins . I see two gentlemen in the back , we made eye contact . Still …More

name: D
text: WOW... Never again... took 3 hours for delivery for 20 minute driving... TOP!

name: Jessica Minder
text: I'm within a mile of two stores and not one delivers also can't understand the person on the phone of the store on Norristown rd or the flourtown location. How ridiculous

name: Brian Fergus
text: Normal Philly style service. Somewhat inattentive, but if you give them a moment you will get a good pizza. It's a chain, don't expect the world.

text: Love it
